blogPost.excerpt: A list of stores for package free food and product🧀, recycling and compost ♻️. Our goal is to end single use plastic.

blogPost.author: Queenie Peng

previous.title:
Berkshire Hathaway (A) has only 650 thousand shares outstanding. 

Few understand this.

localize.full_text:
伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（A）只有65万股流通股。

很少有人明白这一点。

伯克希爾-哈撒韋公司（A）只有65萬股流通股。

很少有人明白這一點。

next.excerpt: Ever wondered what would happen to crypto wallet after you die ? Want to leave a message to world the day you pass away ? I would love to get your feedback on the idea, the design and the user experience :-) Most of the actions are work in progress though.
next.title: Wayt - Don't leave without saying goodbye

localize.description: 有没有想过，你死后，加密钱包会发生什么？想在你去世的那一天给世界留下一句话吗？我很想得到你对这个想法、设计和用户体验的反馈：-) 不过大部分的操作都在进行中。
有沒有想過，你死後，加密錢包會發生什麼？想在你去世的那一天給世界留下一句話嗎？我很想得到你對這個想法、設計和用戶體驗的反饋：-) 不過大部分的操作都在進行中。
